## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                       | Type      |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------- | --------- |
| `isOpen` | `is-open` | Setting this prop enables control over the panel. | `boolean` |

| Event             | Detail | Description                         |
| ----------------- | ------ | ----------------------------------- |
| `onTogglePressed` |        | Executes when title area is pressed |
